sendAddress: Send the address or scan the code
notConnected: You are not connected to any address.
setPasswordInfo1: The password will be used only on this device.
savePhrase: Write the phrase on a piece of paper. Once you create the wallet, you will not have access to it again.
savePhraseWarning: We are not responsible for the loss of the mnemonic phrase or the private key, and we do not have access to this data.
savePhraseWarningNewWallet: Backup your current wallet before generating a new one
gasPriceTooltip: The cost for gas, expressed in Gwei. This is an estimate and may differ from the actual transaction cost.
transactionFeeTooltip: The amount paid to the miner for processing the transaction.

error.unpredictableGasLimit: Error estimating gas. Manual limits setting may be required.
error.invalidAddress: The entered address is not valid.
error.invalidValue: The entered value is not valid.
error.gasPriceTooLow: The gas price is too low.
error.callException: The address is incorrect for the selected chain
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
